name: Suicune
author: Ayaka Yoshida
flavor_text: This Pokémon races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow whenever it appears.

poke_body.name: Extreme Speed
poke_body.effect: Suicune’s Retreat Cost is {C} less for each {W} Energy attached to Suicune.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
